mapper.insert: insert into att_order(order_no, order_lastprice, user_no, att_date, buyer_tel, buyer_email, buyer_name, att_no, coupon_no, total_quantity) values (att_order_no_seq.nextval, #{lastPrice}, #{userNo}, #{attDate}, #{buyerTel}, #{buyerEmail}, #{buyerName}, #{attNo}, #{couponNo}, #{totalQuantity})

select att_order_no_seq.nextval from dual
insert into att_order(order_no, order_lastprice, user_no, att_date, buyer_tel, buyer_email, buyer_name, att_no, coupon_no, total_quantity) values (#{orderNo}, #{lastPrice}, #{userNo}, #{attDate}, #{buyerTel}, #{buyerEmail}, #{buyerName}, #{attNo}, #{couponNo}, #{totalQuantity})

mapper.select: select a.order_date, a.order_lastprice, a.att_date, a.order_process, a.total_quantity, o.att_option, o.att_price, p.product_quantity, t.att_place, t.att_name from att_order a, att_order_product p, att_option o, attraction t where a.order_no = p.order_no(+) and p.option_no = o.att_optno(+) and o.att_no = t.att_no(+) and a.user_no=#{userNo}
